nchack.NCData.vertical_range¶

NCData.vertical_range(self, cores=1)¶

Calculate the depth-averaged range

Parameters

cores (int) – Number of cores to use if files are processed in parallel. Defaults to non-parallel operation

Returns

Reduced tracker with the depth-averaged range

Return type

nchack.NCTracke
